title: Calc GDP change given investment change, MPC

content.prompt: Suppose that in an economy with lump-sum taxes and no international trade, autonomous investment spending increases by $2 million. If the marginal propensity to consume is 0.75, equilibrium gross domestic product will change by a maximum of

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
